changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_guild') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Event_Logs WHERE guild_id = @guild_id DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Bank_Event_Logs WHERE guild_id = @guild_id DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Game_Money_Event_Logs WHERE guild_id = @guild_id DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Relationship_Infos WHERE owner_id = @guild_id OR target_id = @guild_id DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Vaults WHERE guild_id = @guild_id DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Equip_Item_Infos WHERE guild_id = @guild_id DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Inventories WHERE guild_id = @guild_id DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Applicants WHERE guild_id = @guild_id DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Members WHERE guild_id = @guild_id DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Ranks WHERE guild_id = @guild_id DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Bank_Rights WHERE guild_id = @guild_id DELETE FROM dbo.Guild_Skills WHERE guild_id = @guild_id DELETE FROM dbo.Guilds WHERE id= @guild_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_guild') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_guild GO
